name: @sozialhelden/twelve-factor-dotenv
author: Sebastian Felix Zappe <sebastian@sozialhelden.de>
description: 12-factor environment-based config for SSR web apps. Isometric API with a filter to decide which secrets are shared with client-side code.

scripts.build:esm: tsc -d --module esnext --target esnext --outDir dist/esm && npm run build:esm:rename && npm run build:esm:edit-map
scripts.build:esm:edit-map: for FILE in `find dist -type f -name "*.mjs"`; do json -I -f $FILE.map -e "this.file='$(basename -- $FILE)'" && sed 's/sourceMappingURL=\([^ ]*\).js.map/sourceMappingURL=\1.mjs.map/g' $FILE > $FILE.remap && mv $FILE.remap $FILE ; done
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/**/* && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && rm dist/**/*.spec.*
scripts.test:prod: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage --no-cache
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run test:prod && npm publish --access public
